title: Talk Dirty To Me
description:
"Warning may cause injury from side-effects related to wet panties." "Must read!" "Tension is out of this world! Mia and Stranger are perfectly unsuitable, and there are crazy twists and delicious turns." "I loved every minute of it!"  The girl with everything…  Mia Reed has a perfect life. A perfect fiancé. A perfect family. A perfect everything. Until a stranger online lures her in with invasive questions, filthy talk and deep mysteries that ignite a craving for something darker and far sexier than perfection. Truth. His. Hers. And everyone she's every known. Because we all have secrets and everyone lies. Even her.  
   ...Meets a man with nothing… 
 Stranger Lowe has a very simple life. No friends. No family. Nothing holds him back or ties him down. Not even morals. For an agreed price he provides an indispensable service using his best skill. Killing. Except his latest job is not so simple. Nothing and no one is who they seem. Except for one woman. She is everything he’s always wanted and everything he can never have.She’s perfect.
...There’s just one problem. He has to kill her.

 Warning: This book goes into kinky, dark and sexy territory. No fade to blacks here. Graphic in every possible way.
author: Imogen Keeper
